title: Whew! Passed
author: Passed
citation: Passed. "Whew! Passed: experience with Cocaine & Drug Testing (ID 81358)". Erowid.org. Sep 24, 2009. erowid.org/exp/81358
report:
This is for people worrying about cocaine and a DT. I had to get a background check/drug test for my job. Failure would've ruined my life so I was anxious. For cocaine I was 84 hours clean and passed. I had to get a background check through the company Hireright and the whole process took 8 days. This is just for reference for those worrying about not receiving results. I worried my rear off thinking the long wait was bad.

Body type 5'9', athletic, ~10-15% body fat 163 pounds.
